mapper.insert: INSERT INTO easyshop_qs_answer( user_id, question_id, an_id, value, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{questionId}, #{anId}, #{value}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
